title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
**MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack - Ultimate Comfort and Organization**

Stay organized, comfortable, and stylish with the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, designed to fit laptops up to 17.3 inches. This versatile backpack is perfect for teachers, business professionals, picnic enthusiasts, and travelers alike.

**Laptop Compatibility**

Fits laptops of various sizes: 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3 inches

**Insulated Cooler Compartment**

Keep your food and drinks at the perfect temperature for 3-5 hours with our insulated cooler compartment, featuring:

* Water-resistant Aluminum material
* High-quality lining material
* Dimensions: 11.4 x 5.5 x 6.9 inches (holds up to 10 cans)
* Foldable design for easy storage

**Multiple Pockets and Storage**

Stay organized with our multiple pockets and storage compartments:

* Main zipper pocket: roomy for clothes, files, papers, and more
* 2 small front pockets for quick access
* 2 side pockets for umbrellas or facial tissues
* Internal organizers with 1 slot and 1 key hook

**Charging Feature**

Stay connected on-the-go with our external USB port and included charging cable (power bank not included)

**Travel-Friendly**

Designed for hassle-free travel with:

* TSA-approved design
* Unfolding angle: 90-180 degrees
* Luggage strap for easy attachment

**Comfort and Security**

Enjoy comfortable carrying with:

* Padded shoulder straps
* Mesh back pads
* Padded handle
* Anti-theft back pocket for passports, wallets, and ID cards

**Durable and Water-Resistant**

Made with high-density polyester fabric that is:

* Resistant to rips and scratches
* Water-resistant for added protection

**Gift Idea**

Perfect gift for friends and family on Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's occasions.

Order your MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack today and experience the ultimate in comfort, organization, and style!

Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Name:** MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack

**Product Description:**

Stay organized, comfortable, and connected on-the-go with the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack. Designed for versatility, this backpack is perfect for teachers, business professionals, picnic enthusiasts, and travelers alike.

**Laptop Compatibility:**
Compatible with 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3-inch laptops, this backpack provides a safe and secure space for your device.

**Insulated Cooler Compartment:**
The insulated cooler compartment features water-resistant Aluminum material, high-quality lining, and a capacity to hold up to 10 cans. It keeps food warm and drinks cold for 3-5 hours and is foldable for easy storage.

**Storage:**
This backpack boasts multiple pockets to keep you organized, including:

* A roomy main zipper pocket for clothes, files, papers, and more
* 2 small front pockets for quick access to essentials
* 2 side pockets for umbrellas, facial tissues, or other small items
* 1 internal organizer with slots and a key hook

**Charging Feature:**
Stay powered up on-the-go with the external USB port and included charging cable. Simply connect your power bank (not included) and you're good to go!

**Travel-Friendly:**
This backpack is TSA-approved and features a luggage strap for easy attachment to your suitcase. The unfolding degree of 90-180 degrees makes it easy to navigate through security checkpoints.

**Comfort:**
The padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and padded handle provide maximum comfort and support for your back and shoulders.

**Anti-Theft:**
The anti-theft pocket at the back of the backpack is perfect for storing valuable items like passports, wallets, and ID cards.

**Material:**
Made from high-density polyester fabric, this backpack is durable, resistant to rips and scratches, and water-resistant.

**Gift Idea:**
The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack makes a great gift for friends and loved ones on Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's.

**Product Dimensions:**
18.1 inches (H) x 12.9 inches (L) x 8.5 inches (W)

Order your MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack today and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and comfort!

**MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack - The Ultimate Companion for Work, Travel, and Play**

Are you tired of lugging around a bulky laptop bag that's uncomfortable to wear and lacks storage space? Look no further! The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack is here to revolutionize your daily commute, travel, and outdoor adventures.

**Laptop Compatibility**

This backpack is designed to fit laptops of various sizes, including 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3 inches, ensuring a snug and secure fit for your device.

**Insulated Cooler Compartment**

Stay refreshed on-the-go with our insulated cooler compartment, capable of holding up to 10 cans. Made with water-resistant Aluminum and high-quality lining material, this compartment keeps food warm and drinks cold for 3-5 hours. Plus, it's foldable for easy storage.

**Multiple Pockets and Storage**

This backpack features a roomy main zipper pocket for clothes, files, papers, and more. Additionally, it has:

* 2 small front pockets for quick access to essentials
* 2 side pockets for umbrellas or facial tissues
* 1 internal organizer with slots and a key hook

**Charging Feature**

Stay connected on-the-go with our external USB port and included charging cable. Simply plug in your power bank (not included) and you're good to go!

**Travel-Friendly**

This backpack is designed with travel in mind:

* TSA-approved design for easy screening
* Unfolds to 90-180 degrees for convenient laptop access
* Luggage strap for secure attachment to your suitcase

**Comfort and Anti-Theft Features**

We've got you covered with:

* Padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and a padded handle for ultimate comfort
* Anti-theft pocket on the back for safe storage of passports, wallets, and ID cards
* Luggage strap for added security

**Durable and Water-Resistant Material**

Made with high-density polyester fabric, this backpack is resistant to rips, scratches, and water damage.

**Suitable for Various Occasions**

Whether you're a teacher, business professional, picnic enthusiast, or travel enthusiast, this backpack has got you covered. It's also an excellent gift idea for Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's occasions.

**Order Your MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack Today!**

Experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and comfort with the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack. Click "Add to Cart" now and get ready to take your daily adventures to the next level!
